casebody.data:
PRUETT
v.
BINGHAM, et al. No. 34A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 25, 2015. H. Lee Davis, Jr., Winston-Salem, for Bingham, Joel D., et al. W.O. Brazil, III, Asheville, for Mountain Home Fire & Rescue Department, Inc., et al. Meghann K. Burke, Asheville, for Mountain Home Fire & Rescue Department, Inc., et al. Katherine Marie Barber-Jones, Raleigh, for Bingham, Joel D., et al. Michael E. Casterline, Asheville, for Brackett, Matthew. Ann C. Rowe, Winston-Salem, for Bingham, Joel D., et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of November 2015 by Third-Party Defendant (Matthew Bracket):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of November 2015."

Third-Party Defendant (Matthew Bracket) shall have up to and including the 14th day of December 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
